abstract: Rohm and Haas, the chemical maker suing Dow Chemical to force Dow to complete its $15 billion takeover deal, has already spent tens of millions of dollars prepping for the consolidation, which may not even happen.
lead_paragraph: Rohm and Haas, the chemical maker suing Dow Chemical to force Dow to complete its $15 billion takeover deal, has already spent tens of millions of dollars prepping for the consolidation, which may not even happen.

headline.main: For Rohm, Costs of Stalled Merger Add Up
